channel.title: Multi-Activity tours | NORTHEAST INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India
channel.description: Recent content in Multi-Activity tours | NORTHEAST INDIA on North by Northeast Journeys | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in Northeast India

item.title: Assam: Tea, Wildlife & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Up close and personal in the Brahmaputra Valley This multi-activity tour takes us to the Brahmaputra valley of Assam.

item.title: Meghalaya: Hike, Bike & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Hike and bike in the land of the matriarchs This particular Multi-activity tour takes us on bicycles and on foot across the Khasi and Jaintia Hills of Meghalaya.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (East): Hike, Bike, Raft & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Birth of one of the greatest river valleys This multi-activity tour of eastern Arunachal Pradesh takes us on bicycles, rafts and on foot across the watershed area of the Brahmaputra River valley.

item.title: Arunachal Pradesh (West): Hike, Bike & Culture | MULTI ACTIVITY TOUR
item.description: Active & Interactive in the High Himalayas This multi-activity tour is situated in Western Arunachal Pradesh, in the state’s Buddhist belt.
